articles.caption: A look at GDC 2023 Core Concept talks. GDC is one of the TOP conferences in gaming.  Pro-tip: the prev talks could be found at the GDC Vault.  A lot of good content there

A look at InnoGames' salary transparency report.  It's worth a look.  $87k for expert game developer
A look at a group of Blizzard staffers filing for Union election.  QA is a vital yet almost always underrated and underappreciated division.
A look at Google Play letting app devs used 3rd party payments to comply with EU -- sadly its just for NON-GAMING apps.
A look at PlayStation Store's lawsuit for stopping 3rdparty retailers to sell digital codes for PS games.
A look at TenthPlanet, a studio founded by former TikTok gaming leaders

A look at Zebedee, a blockchain game payments system built on Bitcion
A look at Nekcom's $8M round with Galaxy Interactive leading
A look at Stray, a game in which you play as an orange kitty cat navigating thru the underground world in a cyberpunk future
